message: Hello Bob! I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Can you meet me there?
Thank you for your offer, Bob! I appreciate your interest in the product. After considering your proposal, I'm willing to meet you halfway. I'm willing to sell it to you for $110.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $95. Can you consider that?
I understand that you're still looking for a better deal, Bob. I'm willing to make another concession. I'm willing to sell it to you for $105.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit far from my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $90, but that's as low as I can go. Can you consider that?
I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'm willing to sell it to you for $102.50.
I appreciate your willingness to make concessions, but I'm still a bit far from my budget. I'm willing to meet you at $85, but that's as low as I can go. Can you consider that?
I understand that you're trying to get the best deal, Bob. However, I'm not willing to go below $100. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $85 and $100. I'm willing to sell it to you for $92.50.
I'm not willing to go above $85, and I'm starting to think about buying from John for $80. Can you meet me at $85, or I'll have to consider other options?
